page.title: 07 First Weybourne Guides
page.content: Our Guide company is one of the users of the new village hall. We use it every Monday evening at 6.00 p.m to 7.45p.m.Our pack has about 25-30 guides split into 4 patrols called Robin, Chaffinch,Bluetits and Kingfishers. At the end of a guide meeting we march into horseshoe formation and sing "Taps".We do different things such as chariot racing,cooking on fires playing games, having treasure hunts and work for badges. This year celebrates{75 years of {guiding.}Our company is taking part in many of the activities and camps.Six of the guide pack are taking part in a Camp Cobra which is a big camp with over 3000 guides there. Three guides have already taken part at Crystal Palace.
